parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure can lead to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
Failure to replace all tires, not just the front ones, can lead to continued safety risks and potential accidents.
symptoms: and concerns about manufacturer's recall procedures.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tires with insufficient load capacity can lead to tire failure, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering Front Suspension Component Failure (Ball Joints and Tie Rod Ends)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of ball joints and tie rod ends can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: excessive wear on ball joints and tie rod ends
lack of protective rubber or grease on the components

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Ball Joint Failure due to Cracked Lifetime Lube Boot
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joint due to a cracked lifetime lube boot can cause the vehicle to drift or pull to one side, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle drifts to the left or right
squealing noise from the left front and rear wheels when moving forward
cracked or broken lube boot around the ball joint.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joint and subsequent steering and alignment issues can cause the vehicle to drift or pull to one side, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle drifts to the left or right
squealing noise from the left front and rear wheels when moving forward.
